summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting that a contractor save FBI interview notes related to the Epstein case into a witness folder using a specific file naming convention. The email indicates the transfer of investigative materials.

persons.name: Hamilton
persons.context: Recipient of the email, tasked with saving FBI interview notes into a witness folder.

persons.name: Ann
persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the handling of Epstein witness interview notes.

connections.description: Both are recipients/copied on an internal email regarding the handling of case materials.

events.title: Transfer of FBI Interview Notes
events.description: An AUSA emails a contractor to save FBI-provided witness interview notes on a CD into a designated witness folder.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The FBI provided a CD containing witness interview notes related to the Epstein case to the Southern District of New York.
An Assistant United States Attorney directed a contractor to archive these notes in a specific witness folder.
The communication demonstrates ongoing investigative evidence handling in November 2019.
